WRITING.TITLE: CANNOT use consumables (xbox one) bug?
WRITING.TEXT: I am a hunter lvl 28, only have one character. I CANNOT use ANY consumables. I never have been. Anytime I try, the icon (any consumable i try to choose) flashes red for a brief second and thats it. touching x, holding x, etc doesn't change a thing. I tried moving all consumables to the vault...then putting them back in my inventory, and nothing changes. I can't use them in the tower, in orbit, patrolling, striking, raiding or storying. Any help/thoughts are appreciated.
